ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>5<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>Short note: Responses are contextually relevant and consistent with the persona but could improve naturalness in phrasing to avoid sounding too formal.

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>1<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: Lacks any reference or acknowledgment of context, which is crucial for the scenario provided and persona portrayed; also inconsistent with caring healer's role.
